SELECT dr.id, dr.degree, dr.graduation_form, d2.item_text as degreeName, d4.item_text as graduationFormName, dr.graduation_time, dr.graduation_school, dr.majors_studied, dr.degree_type FROM train_degree_record dr LEFT JOIN sys_dict AS d1 ON d1.dict_code = 'degree' and d1.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item AS d2 ON (d2.item_value = dr.degree AND d1.id = d2.dict_id) LEFT JOIN sys_dict AS d3 ON d3.dict_code = 'graduation_form' and d3.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item AS d4 ON (d4.item_value = dr.graduation_form AND d3.id = d4.dict_id)
dr.del_flag = 0 and dr.train_archive_id = #{id}
